{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":2969223,"name":"Mack","username":"Michael_Kaurich","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/michael_kaurich/{size}/6292_2.png","created_at":"2021-09-24T21:30:59.668Z","cooked":"

Over the last few seasons members from the REV team have built different mechanisms to help teams get ideas and get started with building their robot for the year’s given FTC game. Starting at Kickoff we start rolling out instant reactions, videos, prototypes, and other materials. The goal of the concept videos is to remove some of the frustrations when getting started without removing all of the challenge from FIRST. The challenge is really a lot of the fun!

This project isn’t about winning your event or becoming a champion on DaVinci but to provide resources to newer teams, new students, and new mentors on things to consider as the season progresses.

This season we have worked with FIRST to develop a great foundation for teams to use with only parts found in through the FIRST Storefront. We hope that the Starter Bot can serve as a launching off point for teams this season.

Starter Bot2339×1654 507 KB

For an overview of the Starter Bot check out our YouTube Video!

For more information on kickoff concepts check out our documentation.

Good luck this year and hope to see you at the competition!
